title: News reports from France. [No. 72/83] = Chroniques de France
brief_description: Cinemagazine: 1. Regine Crespin - Began singing at 16, three years at Paris conservatory…the story of Regine Crespin. Includes some excerpts of arias sung by the diva. 2. The Dunkirk-Marseille Thruway - 1073 kilometers of thruway. 3. The stunt man - The work of stunt man Remy Julienne, or how all undue risk must be avoided because you cannot cheat. You must not cheat. 4. Louis Malle - Louis Malle, aged 39, has directed ten major films.
